directions: Place the beef stew meat, sausage, onion, and potatoes into a slow cooker, and stir to distribute evenly. Spoon the baked beans evenly over the mixture. Cover, and cook on Low for 8 to 10 hours, or cook on High for 4 to 5 hours.
ingredients: 1/2 pound smoked sausage of your choice, sliced
title: Chuckwagon Stew
